cause.description:
Greensburg Kansas is all gone from a torando that whiped out there whole town. The church is gone so they are having church outside under a tent in the parking lot. Pretty much all of the people that lived in greensburg KS is living on the street.
1. We need to help greensburg KS.
cause.mission: rise money for people down in greensburg KS for there town so they can start building new buildings!
cause.name: greensburg Kansas
